channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Stuff has been nuts!
item.description: Hello friends! I know it’s been a long time since I’ve updated. I’ve been meaning to get back around to my blog…. look forward to updates again soon!

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello! I have found Hugo and built a website with it. The website is hosted on MarkdownSite. There is even a repo with the source code for this website.. Such cool. Much wow. Look forward to updates every Monday, Wednesday and Saturday!
